participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and caring, Ella enjoys exploring the outdoors and cherishes family time.
participant_1.background: I check my grades before anything else. I am working too much and not spending enough time with my family. I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field. I own a Chevy Tahoe. I can be quite forgetful.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Introverted but creative, Ryan enjoys solitude and expresses himself through filmmaking.
participant_2.background: I like to be alone, but I love my baby. I love watching Silicon Valley and making videos for my YouTube channel. I have never been to the west coast of the United States. I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it. I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.

content.text: Good! Just finished watching a video of a baby playing with a ball.
Aw, that sounds cute. I'm a wildlife photographer, so I love seeing cute baby animals.
That's cool! What kind of wildlife do you photograph?
I like to photograph bears and birds. I'm also a big fan of nature photography.
I love nature too! What's your favorite place to go for nature photography?
I love going to the mountains. I live in Colorado, so I'm lucky to have some beautiful mountains nearby.
I love the mountains! I've never been to Colorado, but I've always wanted to go.
You should come visit! It's beautiful here.
Have you ever heard of the movie "The Revenant"?
Yes! I love that movie! That's one of the reasons I want to go to Colorado.
That's great! It's a beautiful place
